Article Title: India match schedule for T20 World Cup: All India upcoming matches, timings, venues
Article Text:
PTI Photo

Special dinner for Team India at Gautam Gambhir’s house in Delhi | T20 World Cup

Match Team vs Team Result Venue Date Match 1 India vs USA India won by 29 runs Wankhede Stadium, Mumbai Sat, Feb 7, 2026 Match 2 India vs Namibia Yet to be played Arun Jaitley Stadium, Delhi Thu, Feb 12, 2026 Match 3 India vs Pakistan Yet to be played R. Premadasa Stadium, Colombo Sun, Feb 15, 2026 Match 4 India vs Netherlands Yet to be played Narendra Modi Stadium, Ahmedabad Wed, Feb 18, 2026

Team India, under the leadership of Suryakumar Yadav , began their T20 World Cup 2026 campaign on a winning note, defeating the United States of America by 29 runs at the Wankhede Stadium on Saturday.The Men in Blue will next face Namibia on Thursday at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in Delhi. That will be followed by a marquee showdown against arch-rivals Pakistan on Sunday, February 15. The much-anticipated clash is set to take place at the R. Premadasa Stadium in Colombo and is expected to be one of the highlights of the group stage.India will wrap up their Group A fixtures with a match against the Netherlands on February 18 at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad.As defending champions, India enter the tournament with a chance to achieve something truly special. In a format where supremacy is often short-lived and margins razor-thin, the team has an opportunity to defend a men’s T20 World Cup title — an achievement that would further strengthen their legacy in the shortest format. India are also aiming to become the first nation to lift the T20 World Cup trophy on home soil.A successful campaign would also make India the first team to win the men’s T20 World Cup three times.India’s journey in the tournament began with glory in the inaugural edition in 2007, when they defeated Pakistan in the final at the New Wanderers Stadium in Johannesburg under the captaincy of Mahendra Singh Dhoni. That iconic triumph laid the foundation for India’s dominance in T20 cricket.The second title, however, came after a long wait. Seventeen years later, India returned to the summit in 2024, with Rohit Sharma leading the side to a memorable title win. India edged past South Africa in a thrilling final to finally end their prolonged title drought.Now, with momentum on their side, India will look to script another historic chapter in T20 World Cup history.
Article Summary: India begin their t20 world cup 2026 campaign against usa on saturday. The men in blue will next face namibia on thursday at the arun jaitley stadium in delhi. That will be followed by a marquee showdown against arch-rivals pakistan on february 15.

Article Title: Shaun White’s life after retirement from competition: Personal life, career, legacy and more
Article Text:
Shaun White. Image via: Getty Images

Shaun White's career after retirement from competition



Shaun White. Image via: Greg Doherty/ Getty Images for St. Regis

Shaun White's Olympic legacy



Who is Shaun White's ex, Nina Dobrev ?



Shaun White and Nina Dobrev. Image via: Getty Images

After his retirement, Shaun White has still been a talk of the town in the Olympic circles. Twenty years after winning gold as a teenager in Italy, the American icon returned for the 2026 Milano-Cortina Winter Olympics in a new role. NBC tapped him as an expert commentator and co-host for the Opening Ceremony at San Siro Stadium in Milan. The five-time Olympian retired after the 2022 Beijing Winter Games, where he finished fourth in his final run.White built a career that redefined snowboarding. He won three Olympic gold medals, all in the halfpipe, and became the most decorated snowboarder in Olympic history. He also owns 15 X Games gold medals and 23 total podium finishes. His astonishing legacy is now reflected in his media presence as he views the games with experienced eyes.Shaun White’s career after retirement from competition is still exciting. At the 2026 Games, he embraced life beyond the halfpipe. "This is all an exciting time for me, from announcing and being a part of the Olympics in this new way," White told Olympics.com."I am excited to take it all in. See the different events like ice skating, skiing, half pipe, big air, obviously snowboarding.I'm just going try to see everything honestly, that's my goal."He even set a playful target. "I'm trying to get Snoop," White said. "Snoop on a snowboard is my goal. We need him on the board, and I'm going to try to do that."White has expanded his influence through business and sport. He founded The Snow League in 2024, aiming to elevate professional snowboarding and freeskiing.At the 2006 Torino Games, he recovered from a poor first run to post a 46.8 in the final and win gold at 19. In Vancouver 2010, he secured victory on his first run and turned the second into a celebratory lap featuring a double McTwist 1260. After missing the podium in Sochi, he returned in 2018 with back to back 1440s to claim his third gold.His road to PyeongChang included a severe crash in 2017. Across five Olympics, he became the face of snowboarding and helped carry it into the mainstream.Shaun White’s personal life drew attention when he and actress Nina Dobrev ended their engagement in September 2025 after five years together. The couple had announced their engagement in October 2024.Dobrev later spoke about taking her time with marriage. "I really want to enjoy it and not rush that process," she told E! News. "We're just enjoying being engaged at this point and being in that sort of phase because a lot of your life is—you have a boyfriend for half of your life and then you have a husband for half of your life, but the fiancé period is very short."It appears that the duo moved on with their personal lives.
Article Summary: Shaun white won three olympic gold medals, all in the halfpipe, and became the most decorated snowboarder in olympic history. Nbc tapped him as an expert commentator and co-host for the opening ceremony at san siro stadium in milan. He and actress nina dobrev ended their engagement in september 2025 after five years together.

Article Title: Will BTS Take Over From Bad Bunny? Inside the Real Race for the 2027 Super Bowl Halftime Show
Article Text:
From BTS to Taylor Swift to Jay-Z, the race to replace Bad Bunny at Super Bowl LXI is already messier than the game itself. (Image via Getty)

BTS and a full K-Pop moment are the loudest early demand

Taylor Swift and Justin Bieber give the NFL the safe nuclear option

Jay-Z and a Roc Nation flex would turn halftime into a power play

So who actually feels most likely to follow Bad Bunny right now?

A BTS-led K-Pop takeover, with BLACKPINK and others, if the NFL decides it has to chase young global viewers at all costs.



A Swift or Bieber headliner if the league wants maximum reach with minimum political headache.



A Jay-Z or Pharrell-and-friends show if Roc Nation wants to turn SoFi into an industry summit.

Bad Bunny just blew up Super Bowl LX. His Apple Music halftime show at Levi’s Stadium pulled record TV and streaming numbers, sparked a week of political outrage and turned 12 minutes of Spanish-language music into the story of the night.Now the league and Roc Nation have to find someone to walk into that fire next. Super Bowl LXI lands at SoFi Stadium in Inglewood, Calif., on Feb. 14, 2027, and every outlet from Billboard to SB Nation and Complex is already throwing darts at the board.Billboard’s fan poll is not a Vegas line, but it shows where the online hunger is. In that poll, BTS sit north of 80% of the vote, with BLACKPINK, Taylor Swift, Morgan Wallen, Post Malone, Harry Styles, Miley Cyrus, Justin Bieber, Drake, Lil Wayne and Jay-Z all miles behind.That lines up with SB Nation’s idea of an outright K-Pop ode at SoFi. Their writers floated BTS anchoring the show, with BLACKPINK on a reunion run and even a fictional band from K-Pop Demon Hunters dropped into the mix.If the NFL decides the only way to top Bad Bunny’s global reach is to lean straight into Korean pop and TikTok culture, this is the move. It is risky for a league that still treats anything non-English like a science experiment, but it is also the clearest path to numbers that look bigger than 2026.SB Nation’s first two names are Taylor Swift and Justin Bieber, for a reason. Roger Goodell has already said the league would welcome Swift at halftime, and the math is obvious: if you want the broadest possible audience, you call the woman who just rewired the touring economy.The hold-up is not demand, it is timing. Swift told Jimmy Fallon in 2025 that she is not eager to build halftime choreography while Travis Kelce is still getting hit every week, and that concern has not magically disappeared. Until she says otherwise, Swift feels like the league’s dream, not its plan.Justin Bieber is different. He just crushed a Grammys performance, sits among the top global streamers and has more than 15 years of hits to stitch into a 12-minute medley. With the Super Bowl falling on Valentine’s Day in 2027, a Bieber-heavy pop set full of stadium sing-alongs is the kind of “nobody gets mad at this” choice the NFL loves.Complex’s early list leans into something more political: a Jay-Z moment. Hov has overseen the halftime era that ran from Shakira and Jennifer Lopez to Rihanna and now Bad Bunny. At Super Bowl LX, he even walked the field in a hoodie that read “The game needs me.”Letting him finally take the stage in Los Angeles would double as a victory lap for Roc Nation and a way to quiet fans who still see the partnership as corporate damage control. A Jay-Z show also opens the door to a Pharrell-style friends set, which Complex floated as another option, stacking guests like The Weeknd or Drake around one producer’s catalogue.It would not match the chaos of Bad Bunny’s political staging, but it would send a clear message about who really calls the shots on Super Bowl Sunday.If you strip away fan wars and stan polls, a few lanes stand out in mid-February 2026:Public betting and prediction markets are already tossing out names like Bieber, Chappell Roan and others, but as of today there is no official decision from the league.
Article Summary: Super bowl lxi lands at sofi stadium in inglewood, calif. on feb. 14, 2027. Bts and a full k-pop moment are the loudest early demand. Taylor swift and justin bieber are the safe nuclear option. Jay-z and a roc nation flex would turn halftime into a power play.

Article Title: 47 times over 200! Team India's T20 batting numbers are just unreal
Article Text:
Since the T20 World Cup 2024, India have registered 14 totals of 200 or more in T20Is, double the number managed by any other side in the same period. (AP Photo)

Why this T20 World Cup could well see a 300 plus total | Will India create history?

T20 World Cup | Tilak Varma provides update on Abhishek's fitness, mindset during rehab

Most 200-plus totals in Men’s T20Is

India have racked up 14 200-plus totals in T20Is post T20 WC 2024

200-plus totals for India in T20WC

NEW DELHI: India once again underlined why they are regarded as the most destructive batting unit in the shortest format, riding on blistering half-centuries from Ishan Kishan and Hardik Pandya to post a formidable 209/9 against Namibia in their Group A clash of the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup 2026 at the Arun Jaitley Stadium on Thursday.Kishan set the tone with a breathtaking 61 off just 24 deliveries, mixing brute force with clean timing as he dismantled Namibia’s pace attack in the powerplay. His innings, studded with crisp boundaries and towering sixes, powered India to a staggering 104/1 in just seven overs. Pandya then took over the mantle, striking a muscular 52 off 28 balls, ensuring India maintained momentum despite losing wickets at regular intervals later in the innings.Namibia, however, found a way to pull things back through their skipper Gerhard Erasmus, who delivered a remarkable spell of unorthodox slingy bowling. Erasmus finished with career-best figures of 4/20, using variations and subtle changes in pace to choke the Indian batters on a surface that offered some grip to the spinners. Alongside Bernard Scholtz, Erasmus applied the brakes through the middle overs, forcing India into errors as they attempted to sustain the scoring rate.Although Pandya staged a late counter-attack to bring up his half-century, India lost five wickets in the final two overs, allowing Namibia to claw back some respectability. From a position where India looked set to breach 220 comfortably, Namibia would take heart from restricting the damage to just over 200.With this innings, India extended their tally of 200-plus scores in Men’s T20 Internationals to 47 — the most by any team. South Africa trail with 29 such totals, followed by New Zealand (28), while Australia and West Indies are joint fourth with 25 each.India’s recent scoring spree has been even more emphatic. Since the T20 World Cup 2024, they have registered 14 totals of 200 or more in T20Is, double the number managed by any other side in the same period. The consistency highlights the depth and fearlessness of India’s batting approach.In T20 World Cup history too, India’s ability to cross the 200-run mark has been a recurring theme. Their notable tallies include 218/4 against England in Durban in 2007, 210/2 versus Afghanistan in Abu Dhabi in 2021, 205/5 against Australia in Gros Islet in 2024, and now 209/9 against Namibia in Delhi in 2026.47 - India29 - South Africa28 - New Zealand25 - Australia25 - West Indies218/4 vs ENG, Durban, 2007210/2 vs AFG, Abu Dhabi, 2021209/9 vs NAM, Delhi, 2026205/5 vs AUS, Gros Islet, 2024
Article Summary: Since the t20 world cup 2024, india have registered 14 totals of 200 or more in t20is. South africa trail with 29 such totals, followed by new zealand (28), while australia and west indies are joint fourth with 25 each. India extended their tally of 200-plus scores in men’s t20 internationals to 47 — the most by any team.

Article Title: 'You can’t just go and think': Rohit Sharma warns Team India ahead of T20 World Cup clash against Pakistan
Article Text:
Rohit Sharma warns Team India ahead of T20 World Cup clash against Pakistan (Photo by PTI and AP)

T20 World Cup | Sahibzada Farhan on India vs Pakistan matches: 'Not one-sided'

NEW DELHI: Former India captain Rohit Sharma has warned Team India not to take their high-profile T20 World Cup 2026 clash against Pakistan lightly, even though they are favourites on paper.India face Pakistan on February 15 at the R. Premadasa Stadium in Colombo, and Rohit believes past records or rankings won’t matter once the match starts.India have dominated Pakistan in T20 World Cups and recent T20Is, but Rohit stressed that cricket can be unpredictable and every team can win on its day.Speaking at an event in Dubai, he said, “Firstly I never believed in this word called favourites. It’s such a funny game, and we’ve seen it now there’s so much that has happened in this last 10 years of international cricket. All these teams have so much exposure now playing T20 cricket."You can’t just go and think that it’s a two-point victory for us. You just have to play good cricket on that particular day to achieve those points otherwise you might end up going home without anything.”He added that current form, reputation or history won’t guarantee success.According to Rohit, the key is performing on the day of the match, because any team can beat another in T20 cricket.“So it’s not about what you’ve done in the past, what is your team like, players are in form or not form. You just have to play well on that particular day because every team is capable of beating any team on that particular day,” he said.India have lost only once to Pakistan in World Cups, in the 2021 T20 World Cup, and have beaten them in their last five T20I meetings.
Article Summary: Rohit sharma warns team india ahead of t20 world cup clash against pakistan. India face pakistan on february 15 at the r premadasa stadium in colombo. Rohit believes past records or rankings won’t matter once the match starts.

Article Title: Will Abhishek Sharma be fit in time? Conflicting updates fuel India-Pakistan suspense before T20 World Cup blockbuster
Article Text:
Abhishek Sharma (Getty Images)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

T20 World Cup | Tilak Varma provides update on Abhishek's fitness, mindset during rehab

Poll Do you think Abhishek Sharma will be fit to play against Pakistan? Yes, he will be fit No, he won't be ready

NEW DELHI: India’s preparations for the high-voltage T20 World Cup clash against Pakistan have been dominated by one burning question — will Abhishek Sharma be fit in time? Conflicting updates from teammates and captain have only added to the intrigue ahead of Sunday’s marquee encounter.Spinner Varun Chakravarthy struck an optimistic note after India’s win over Namibia, revealing that the explosive opener could be on track for a comeback. “As far as I have spoken to him he looks good, he did some practice today also. He told me he is on the way,” Varun said, hinting at a possible return.However, skipper Suryakumar Yadav painted a more cautious picture. Abhishek, who was hospitalised earlier this week with a stomach infection, is still regaining strength after being discharged. “Abhishek isn’t fine still, might take one or two games,” Surya admitted, suggesting the team would prioritise his full recovery.The attacking left-hander missed the Namibia clash, where Sanju Samson partnered Ishan Kishan at the top of the order. Even as the team trained at the Arun Jaitley Stadium, Abhishek did not join full sessions, with reports indicating weakness and slight weight loss following the illness.Team management is expected to make a final call after monitoring his workload during training in Colombo. Traditionally, Abhishek spends long hours batting in nets and that endurance test could determine whether he is ready for the pressure of an India-Pakistan showdown.For now, India appear caught between hope and caution: Varun’s upbeat “he is on the way” versus Suryakumar’s realistic “might take one or two games” assessment.
Article Summary: Abhishek sharma was hospitalised earlier this week with a stomach infection. India face pakistan in their opening t20 world cup match on sunday. Varun chakravarthy and suryakumar yadav have given conflicting updates on sharma's fitness.

Article Title: ICC T20 World Cup 2026: Full Match Schedule For February 13
Article Text:
Team Australia (Photo by Robert Cianflone/Getty Images)

T20 World Cup | Muhammad Waseem press conference after loss vs New Zealand

NEW DELHI: The ICC Men’s T20 World Cup 2026 continues to gather momentum, with three intriguing group-stage clashes scheduled for Friday, February 13, as teams look to strengthen their positions in a fiercely competitive tournament.The day begins with Australia vs Zimbabwe in Colombo at the R Premadasa Stadium.Australia, who have started their campaign on a strong note, will aim to maintain their momentum and consolidate their position in Group B.Zimbabwe, meanwhile, have impressed with an early win and will be eager to challenge the five-time world champions, making this a potentially high-octane encounter between two attacking sides.The second match of the day will see Canada take on the United Arab Emirates (UAE) at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in Delhi.Both associate nations are still searching for their first win in Group D, and this fixture could prove crucial for their World Cup aspirations.With both teams keen to break their winless run, the match promises a tight contest, with pride and points on the line.The final match on February 13 will feature the United States of America vs the Netherlands at Chennai’s MA Chidambaram Stadium.The Netherlands have been competitive in Group A, while the USA will be desperate to bounce back after early losses.The Chepauk surface, known for assisting spinners, could play a key role in shaping the outcome of the contest.With the group stage heating up and teams battling for qualification spots, February 13 promises a packed day of action across three venues, featuring a mix of heavyweight clashes and crucial associate battles.As the race for the Super 8 stage intensifies, every match, point and net run rate could prove decisive in the 2026 T20 World Cup.
Article Summary: The icc men’s t20 world cup 2026 continues to gather momentum, with three intriguing group-stage clashes scheduled for friday, february 13. The day begins with australia vs zimbabwe in colombo at the r premadasa stadium. The second match of the day will see canada take on the united arab emirates (uae) at the arun jaitley stadium in delhi.

Article Title: Fact check: Did Bad Bunny and Kendall Jenner leave together after his controversial Super Bowl LX performance?
Article Text:
Did Bad Bunny and Kendall Jenner leave together after his controversial Super Bowl LX performance where she cheered him on?(Image via Getty Images)

Bad Bunny’s moment with Kendall Jenner sparks chaos after she cheered him on at Super Bowl LX



Bad Bunny has divided the country with his Super Bowl LX performance



Bad Bunny, the Super Bowl LX halftime show headliner, broke records on Sunday night with his performance even though it has divided the country.While Bad Bunny set the stage on fire, his ex girlfriend and supermodel, Kendall Jenner, was also spotted at the show along with her sister, Kim Kardashian and her new romance, Lewis Hamilton. Amid this, a clip of Bad Bunny and Kendall Jenner leaving together in a luxurious car has sparked chaos.A few hours ago, a clip of the popular Grammy winner Bad Bunny and Kendall Jenner hopping into his $3 million Buggati Chiron have sparked panic among fans.Much to the disappointment of fans, the clip is actually three years old. The popular clip was taken in April 2023 when Bad Bunny and Kendall Jenner were publicly dating and had gone to Tyler, the Creator’s concert.The “Debí Tirar Más Fotos” artist, Bad Bunny and Kendall Jenner went public with their high profile relationship in 2023 but went their separate ways by the end of that year.Later, in 2024, the two did get back together for a few months but ended things again. Since then, both Bad Bunny and Kendall Jenner have moved on in their respective lives.While Bad Bunny’s picture at the 68th Annual Grammy Awards with Kendall Jenner’s best friends, Hailey Bieber, and Justin Bieber did spark rumors of a reunion, nothing has been confirmed yet.Neither Bad Bunny nor Kendall Jenner have commented on rumors of them rekindling their romance yet.Despite their high profile relationship coming to a dramatic end, it seems both remain on friendly terms as Kendall Jenner was even spotted enjoying Bad Bunny’s record breaking performance at Super Bowl LX halftime show.While Bad Bunny’s show broke records, it has also divided citizens across the country.To make things worse, President Donald Trump has brutally slammed Bad Bunny’s performance at Super Bowl LX.President Donald Trump took to social media to post, “The Super Bowl Halftime Show is absolutely terrible, one of the worst, EVER! It makes no sense, is an affront to the Greatness of America, and doesn’t represent our standards of Success, Creativity, or Excellence…”However, Bad Bunny has stayed away from commenting on it.
Article Summary: A clip of bad bunny and kendall jenner leaving together in a luxurious car has sparked chaos. The popular clip was taken in april 2023 when the two were publicly dating. The two went public with their high profile relationship in 2023 but went their separate ways by the end of that year.

Article Title: “I spiraled into depression”: Olympian Chloe Kim opens up on her emotional state as she nears another win amid romance with Myles Garrett
Article Text:
Olympian Chloe Kim opens up on her emotional state as she nears another win amid romance with Myles Garrett.(Image via Getty Images)

Chloe Kim shares the difficult days in her life as Myles Garrett cheers her on

Myles Garrett has been a strong support to Chloe Kim

Myles Garrett, the Cleveland Browns’ star player, has proven to be a pretty supportive and loving partner to his girlfriend, the popular Olympian Chloe Kim.As fans root for Chloe Kim to win gold for the third time in the 2026 Winter Olympics in Italy, the 25 year old athlete has opened up about some of the traumatic times in her life.Recently, in an emotional interview with ELLE, Chloe Kim recalled the time she win gold medal at the Beijing Games but struggled mentally and emotionally.ID@undefinedCaption not available.The 25 year old Olympian, Chloe Kim, said, “Beijing was just challenging in itself. It was during COVID. It wasn't like the most ideal circumstances.”The two time Olympian added, “Family couldn't be there. Friends couldn't be there. No one could be there. By the time I came back home, I had already kind of experienced all the waves of emotion, and I spiraled into another depression.”Chloe Kim continued, “It's really hard to describe and explain. We are so focused on this one thing for such an extended period of time. When it's over, it's very strange.”While Chloe Kim faced a lot of difficult things in life at a pretty young age, she kept her focus on her career and has now turned into one of the most popular Olympians in the world.Chloe Kim’s romance with the Cleveland Browns’ star player, Myles Garrett, has also turned heads over the last few months.While the two were mostly private about their romance, things changed when they shared a heartfelt kiss on the sidelines before a game in November 2025.Ever since then, both Chloe Kim and Myles Garrett have become much more public with their romance.A few weeks ago, as Chloe Kim recovered from a brutal shoulder injury that she had sustained, the Cleveland Browns’ star player, Myles Garrett even flew to Switzerland to be by her side during a pretty difficult time.Both Chloe Kim and Myles Garrett have always been private about their personal life previously but the popular Olympian has admitted how he has changed her life for the better.
Article Summary: Olympian chloe kim opens up on her emotional state as she nears another win amid romance with myles garrett. The 25 year old athlete has opened up about some of the traumatic times in her life. Chloe kim is currently competing in the 2026 winter olympics in italy.

Article Title: Anthony Joshua honours late friends Sina Ghami and Latif Ayodele with arm tattoo after Nigeria accident
Article Text:
Anthony Joshua honours late friends Sina Ghami and Latif Ayodele with arm tattoo after Nigeria accident (Image Via Getty Images)

Anthony Joshua honours Sina Ghami and Latif Ayodele after tragic Nigeria crash

Anthony Joshua is known for his strength inside the boxing ring. But this time, the two-time heavyweight champion showed his pain outside it. The British star has paid an emotional tribute to his two close friends, Sina Ghami and Latif “Latz” Ayodele, who died in a tragic car crash in Nigeria in December. Joshua himself narrowly survived the same accident.To honour them, the 36-year-old had their names tattooed on his right arm at a London tattoo studio, placing the words “LATZ” and “SINA” under his famous Africa outline tattoo. The moment quickly touched fans around the world and reminded many of the deep bond he shared with the two men who supported his career and life.The tattoo was first revealed by Fulham Tattoo London on Instagram. The studio shared photos and wrote, “Huge thank you to two-time heavyweight champion of the world Anthony Joshua for unexpectedly and unannounced walking through the door a few weeks ago for his first visit with us at Fulham Tattoo London… what a walk in!” The post confirmed the tribute and showed how personal the visit was.Joshua had travelled to Nigeria after knocking out Jake Paul in Miami. Although he was born in Watford, his family roots are Nigerian, and the trip was meant to be a happy return home.Sadly, everything changed when the car carrying Ghami and Ayodele hit a stationary truck near Lagos, leading to their deaths. Ghami worked as Joshua’s strength and conditioning coach, while Ayodele was his personal trainer and close friend.After receiving hospital care, Joshua returned to England for the funeral. Soon after, he shared an emotional video on social media, speaking through tears. He said, “The last time I spoke to you guys was in Miami, we had so many plans to wrap up 2025… everything got flipped on its head. That was such an unforeseen circumstance that was out of all of our control.”He continued, “We lost people that we dearly care about… major, major players in all of our lives. It’s tough. It’s really tough.” Joshua also described them as brothers, housemates, and partners in life’s journey, adding, “You think I’m the big guy, but I was walking with giants. Protected.”Joshua has not confirmed when he will return to boxing. Still, promoter Eddie Hearn said he expects Joshua could face Tyson Fury later this year, showing that the sport continues to wait for his decision. For now, the tattoo stands as a quiet and lasting memory of friendship, loss, and love.
Article Summary: Anthony joshua has paid an emotional tribute to his two close friends. Sina ghami and latif ayodele died in a tragic car crash in nigeria in december. Joshua himself narrowly survived the same accident. The 36-year-old had their names tattooed on his right arm.

Article Title: Kayla Nicole breaks silence with cryptic message after alleged controversial digs at Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce
Article Text:
Kayla Nicole breaks silence with cryptic message after alleged controversial digs at Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce.(Image via Getty Images)

Kayla Nicole shares her response after making digs at Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce



Kayla Nicole was forced to take off the commercial as Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce stay distant
Article Summary: Kayla nicole breaks silence with cryptic message after alleged controversial digs at taylor swift and travis kelce. The actress was forced to take off the commercial as taylor swift stayed distant from the singer. "i don't think i've ever been so mad in my life," she said.

Article Title: Myles Garrett steals spotlight in bold Chloe Kim photo jacket ahead of her Milano Cortina 2026 Olympic halfpipe final
Article Text:
Myles Garrett steals spotlight in bold Chloe Kim photo jacket ahead of her Milano Cortina 2026 Olympic halfpipe final (Image via Getty)



Myles Garrett supports Chloe Kim at Milano Cortina after her historic olympic gold runs

Chloe Kim was ready to drop into the halfpipe in Italy, fans were already looking at someone else. It was Myles Garrett, and he made sure nobody missed him. Right before the women’s snowboard halfpipe final at the Milano Cortina Winter Olympics, Garrett showed up wearing a custom jacket with Chloe Kim’s face printed all over it. Cameras caught him smiling wide, cheering loudly, and posing proudly next to her. For a moment, the spotlight shifted from the snow to the stands.Chloe Kim, a two-time Olympic gold medalist, was chasing history. She had already won gold in the women’s snowboard halfpipe at the 2018 Pyeongchang Winter Olympics and again at the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympics. Now she was aiming for a third straight title. And right there in the crowd was the Cleveland Browns star, dressed in what many fans called the wildest outfit of the night.Myles Garrett had just won the NFL Defensive Player of the Year award during Super Bowl week in San Francisco. Chloe Kim could not attend the ceremony because she was training in Italy. Still, she reacted with joy on social media and showed how proud she was of him.Myles Garrett arrived in Italy just in time to watch Chloe Kim compete in her qualifying round. The halfpipe has been her stage for years. In Pyeongchang in 2018, she became the youngest woman to win Olympic snowboarding gold at just 17 years old.Four years later in Beijing, she became the first woman to win two Olympic gold medals in the snowboard halfpipe event.So when she stepped up again, the pressure was real. But Garrett looked calm, almost like a super fan. In one widely shared photo, he stood tall in his custom Winter Olympics jacket, covered with Kim’s image. Later, the two posed together for cameras, smiling and relaxed before the big ride.Their relationship has also drawn attention. Rumors began in March when they were seen together at the Crunchyroll Anime Awards in Tokyo. Since then, they have appeared at public events and at NFL games, making their relationship official without saying too much.On this night, though, words were not needed. Myles Garrett’s jacket said it all. He came to support. And even in a crowd full of Olympians, he found a way to stand out while cheering for Chloe Kim.
Article Summary: Myles garrett showed up at the milano cortina winter olympics wearing a jacket with chloe kim's face printed all over it. The cleveland browns star had just won the nfl defensive player of the year award during super bowl week in san francisco. Chloe kim could not attend the ceremony because she was training in italy.

Article Title: After Super Bowl outing with Kim Kardashian, Lewis Hamilton shuts down dating questions
Article Text:
Lewis Hamilton and Kim Kardashian at Super Bowl (Image credit: X)

Lewis Hamilton and Kim Kardashian spark dating rumors at the Super Bowl

Hamilton refuses to discuss Kim Kardashian when asked by reporters

“It’s my private life. I’m not talking about that.”

The Super Bowl always delivers drama and this year was no different either. Lewis Hamilton and Kim Kardashian were seen together at Super Bowl LX, instantly setting off dating rumors online. Fans started speculating, social media went into detective mode and entertainment outlets quickly picked up the story. But when Hamilton was later asked about his rumored Super Bowl date, the Formula 1 champion made one thing very clear: he wasn’t going to talk about it.Lewis Hamilton and Kim Kardashian were spotted together during Super Bowl weekend, fueling dating rumors. The two global stars attending the same high-profile event naturally drew attention, especially given Kardashian’s history of headline-making relationships and Hamilton’s status as one of the biggest names in motorsport.Fans began questioning whether the appearance was simply two celebrities attending the same event or something more. However, neither Hamilton nor Kardashian made any public statement at the time confirming a relationship.The real turning point in the story came after the Super Bowl. During media duties ahead of the Formula 1 season, Hamilton was asked directly about Kim Kardashian and their Super Bowl appearance.Rather than entertain the speculation, Hamilton declined to answer questions about it. He reportedly emphasized that his private life is exactly that, "private” and made it clear he would not discuss personal matters with the press.As of now, there has been no confirmation from either Lewis Hamilton or Kim Kardashian that they are dating.The Super Bowl has increasingly become more than just a football game. It’s one of the biggest pop culture stages in the world, where athletes, musicians, actors, and influencers all gather.When two high-profile figures like Lewis Hamilton and Kim Kardashian are seen together in that setting, headlines are almost guaranteed. In many ways, the buzz says as much about the event’s cultural reach as it does about the celebrities involved.
Article Summary: Lewis hamilton and kim kardashian were seen together at the super bowl. The two global stars drew attention, especially given kardashian’s history of headline-making relationships. When asked about his rumored super bowl date, the formula 1 champion made one thing very clear: he wasn't going to talk about it.

Article Title: Fact check: Did Cardi B confess “I regret having a child with him” in a new clip amid breakup rumors with Stefon Diggs?
Article Text:
Did Cardi B confess “I regret having a child with him” in a new clip amid breakup rumors with Stefon Diggs?(Image via CBS, Getty Images)

Did Cardi B open up about breaking up with Stefon Diggs after Super Bowl LX?



Cardi B left the Super Bowl midway and removed Stefon Diggs from her social media account



Stefon Diggs and Cardi B’s dramatic high profile relationship might have come to an end on Sunday night as both of them have removed each other from their social media accounts respectively.This has confused many as Stefon Diggs has been pretty open about his admiration for Cardi B. Amid this, a clip of Cardi B allegedly confessing how she was mistreated by Stefon Diggs has sparked chaos.A few hours ago, a clip was posted on X where Cardi B allegedly talks about breaking up with Stefon Diggs on Sunday night as he played in Super Bowl LX.In the infamous clip, Cardi B says, “I told Stefon very clearly, if he ever cheated or had another kid while we were together and he still chose to cross it…”Cardi B allegedly added, “Honestly, I think Stefon is worse than Offset…I regret having a child with him”While this has sparked chaos among fans, the clip is AI generated and not a real confession of the Grammy winner’s.The “Am I the Drama?” artist has made no statements related to her alleged break up with Stefon Diggs as she seems fully focused on her tour.The New England Patriots’ star player, Stefon Diggs, has also stayed away from making any statements about Cardi B.At this point in time, it is not publicly confirmed when Stefon Diggs and Cardi B chose to part ways or the reason behind such a decision.However, on Sunday night, as Stefon Diggs took the field against the Seattle Seahawks, fans were quick to notice he had an ex girlfriend seated in the front row.Many also realised that Cardi B left the game mid way and removed Stefon Diggs from her social media accounts.But this has sparked confusion as Stefon Diggs had even hinted at proposing to Cardi B on Sunday night.At a recent press conference, Stefon Diggs praised Cardi B and said, “As a significant other I really appreciate it…It’s a level of appreciation because she’s an amazing woman.”The New England Patriots’ star player added, “Being there for me is hard, you can imagine. I’m a lot to deal with but I never want to not let her know that I appreciate her for being there. Not just for the games but she supported me when she wasn’t there.”
Article Summary: Did cardi b confess “i regret having a child with him” in a new clip amid breakup rumors with stefon diggs? Both of them have removed each other from their social media accounts respectively. It is not publicly confirmed when they chose to part ways or the reason behind such a decision.

Article Title: Team Canada Sends Statement With Dominant 5-0 Shutout of Czechia at Milan Olympics
Article Text:
Team Canada after their 5-0 against Czechia (Via Getty Images)

Team Canada again proved why they remain the favorites to win gold



Canada left no doubt about its gold medal credentials on Thursday. Jon Cooper's squad dismantled Czechia 5-0 in its opening game of the 2026 Winter Olympics, with contributions across all four lines, showcasing depth and skill at Milano Santagiulia Ice Hockey Arena.The tone was set before the first intermission when Macklin Celebrini tipped a Cale Makar blast from the blue line past Lukas Dostal with just 5.7 seconds remaining in the period. At 19 years old, Celebrini became the youngest Canadian NHLer ever to score a goal at the Olympics. But that was just the start for the side.Canada entered the tournament with a chip on its shoulder, and Celebrini made sure they lived up to the stakes. While the Czechs controlled the game in the first period, the Sharks’ youngster ensured his side had the lead by the end of the period.Meanwhile, Connor McDavid finished with three assists and a game-high six shots on goal, recording the first Olympic points of his career. Captain Sidney Crosby added two assists as he closed the gap between himself and Jarome Iginla for the most points by a Canadian at the Olympics.Thomas Harley led all skaters with 20 minutes and 35 seconds of ice time and chipped in two helpers of his own.After a competitive opening 20 minutes where shots were tied 11-11, Canada seized control in the second period.Mitch Marner made a spectacular individual play along the left wall, driving to the net and sliding a pass across the crease while falling over a sprawled David Spacek. Mark Stone was waiting at the far post for the easy tap-in to make it 2-0.Bo Horvat put the game out of reach minutes later, taking a feed from Brad Marchand at full speed through the neutral zone before going in alone and beating Dostal through the five-hole. Canada outshot Czechia 36-26 and won 55 percent of faceoffs in the lopsided victory.The third period belonged to Canada's stars. Nathan MacKinnon scored on the power play just 13 seconds after Dominik Kubalik was called for interference, finishing off a sequence that moved from Makar to Crosby to McDavid before reaching his stick.Nick Suzuki capped the scoring by redirecting a McDavid pass from point-blank range to complete the rout. The lone concern for Canada was defenseman Josh Morrissey, who left early in the second period and did not return.Shea Theodore slid into his spot alongside Colton Parayko. No injury replacement can be added now that the tournament has started. Canada faces Switzerland on Friday in its second Group A matchup, looking to build on a goal differential advantage that could prove critical for seeding in the elimination round.
Article Summary: Team canada defeated czechia 5-0 in its opening game of the 2026 winter olympics. Macklin celebrini became the youngest canadian nhler ever to score a goal at the olympics. Connor mcdavid recorded the first olympic points of his career with three assists.

Article Title: Quote of the day by Lindsey Vonn: 'I’m never tired of winning'
Article Text:
Lindsey Vonn (AP Photo)

‘Terrifying’ Olympic Ski Star Lindsey Vonn’s Crash Seen In Shocking Photos

Quote of the day:

I'm never tired of winning, and I'm never tired of skiing."

NEW DELHI: The words echo with the fierce determination that has defined one of alpine skiing’s greatest champions.For Lindsey Vonn , winning has never just been about medals, it has been about resilience, comeback, and an unrelenting hunger to push boundaries.Just days after a devastating crash at the Milan Cortina Games, Vonn delivered another powerful reminder of her mindset, updating fans from her hospital bed after undergoing a “successful” third surgery on her broken left leg.“I had my 3rd surgery today and it was successful. Success today has a completely different meaning than it did a few days ago,” Vonn wrote on Instagram, sharing photos of herself giving a thumbs-up with a metal frame stabilising her leg. “I’m making progress and while it is slow, I know I’ll be ok.”Earlier this month, during the Winter Olympics, the 41-year-old skiing legend crashed just 13 seconds into her downhill run and was airlifted off the course, later revealing a complex tibia fracture that would require multiple surgeries.The setback came just nine days after she ruptured the ACL in the same knee yet another chapter in a career marked by extraordinary highs and punishing injuries.Vonn’s comeback story had already captivated fans worldwide.After nearly six years of retirement, she returned to competitive skiing in December 2024 following knee surgery earlier that year.Heading into the Olympics, she was in sensational form, winning two downhills, finishing on the podium in seven of eight World Cup races, and proving she could still dominate the speed events.Doctors noted that her injury required external fixation, a technique used to stabilise severe fractures, but Vonn’s spirit remained unbroken.Surrounded by family and flooded with messages of support, she thanked medical staff, friends, and fans, while also cheering on her Team USA teammates from her hospital room.Billie Jean King hailed her as “Forever the champion,” while Allyson Felix sent messages of love and encouragement.Teammates called her “the baddest there is,” reflecting the respect she commands across the sporting world.“I’m never tired of winning” may sound like a simple statement, but in Vonn’s journey, it represents far more than trophies. It symbolises an athlete who refuses to surrender—to injury, to age, or to doubt.
Article Summary: Lindsey vonn updates fans from her hospital bed after undergoing a “successful’ third surgery on her broken left leg. The 41-year-old skiing legend crashed just 13 seconds into her downhill run and was airlifted off the course, later revealing a complex tibia fracture that would require multiple surgeries.

Article Title: Jordan Binnington’s record shutout in his Olympic debut leads Canada to beat Czechia by 5-0
Article Text:
Jordan Binnington recorded a 26-save shutout in his Olympic debut with Team Canada (Image via NHL)

Jordan Binnington recorded a 26-save shutout in his Olympic debut against Czechia

Team Canada launched their Olympic campaign in Group A with a 5-0 win over Czechia, and 19-year-old Macklin Celebrini opening the scoring for Canada on Thursday. This win could be possible due to the star players of Canada, including NHL superstars Connor McDavid and Sidney Crosby. After a long hiatus, the nine-time Olympic champions delivered their first statement at the Milano Cortina 2026 Games.Meanwhile, goaltender Jordan Binnington is another player who has played a significant role in Team Canada's victory. He recorded a shutout in his Olympic debut, helping Canada defeat Czechia by 5-0. It is worth noting that the last time Czechia met Canada was at an Olympic tournament, specifically in the 2018 bronze medal game, where the Canadians secured the medal. Team Canada’s goaltender Jordan Binnington recorded a 26-save shutout in his Olympic debut against Czechia on Thursday. His effort has helped the club to attain a 5-0 victory in their opening game against Team Czechia at the Olympic Winter Games Milano Cortina 2026.The St. Louis Blues netminder was making his first appearance in the Olympics after he helped Canada to a championship at the 4 Nations Face-Off last season. According to the NHL, Binnington has now won three straight games for Team Canada and is 4-1-0 for Canada in best-on-best tournaments.Earlier, Binnington made 23 saves in helping Canada to a 4-3 overtime win against Sweden at Bell Centre in the opening game of the tournament, which earned Canada two points, according to the NHL.Reaffirming his confidence, Jon Cooper stated of the goaltender after Canada’s win, “I can’t predict how things are going to go, but I have extreme confidence in that kid, and I have for the past year.” Expressing his happiness, the head coach reiterated, "He’s a proven winner to me. I have all the faith in the world in him, and I know our team does. You still have to go out there and perform, and he did just that."The player exhibited exceptional skill and talent, particularly during the first period, when he faced 11 shots and made a couple of key saves on Tomas Hertl (Vegas Golden Knights) and another on David Pastrnak (Boston Bruins) when the game was tight.Interestingly, this match was Binnington’s first international game after scoring 31 saves in a 3-2 overtime win over the United States in the championship of the 4 Nations Face-Off.
Article Summary: Jordan binnington recorded a 26-save shutout in his olympic debut against czechia. The st. louis blues goaltender was making his first appearance in the olympics after he helped canada to a championship at the 4 nations face-off last season. He has now won three straight games for team canada and is 4-1-0 in best-on-best tournaments.

Article Title: "I just feel so bad": Lilah Fear reacts after free dance error ends Team GB medal hope at the Winter Olympics with Lewis Gibson
Article Text:
"I just feel so bad": Lilah Fear reacts after free dance error ends Team GB medal hope at the Winter Olympics with Lewis Gibson (Image Via Getty Images)

Lilah Fear and Lewis Gibson react emotionally after costly free dance error at Winter Olympics

Auld Lang Syne

I’m Gonna Be (500 Miles)

Lilah Fear stood on the Olympic ice with dreams of a historic medal for Team GB. But within moments, everything changed. The 26-year-old ice dancer became emotional after a small mistake during the free dance routine ended the pair’s medal hopes at the Winter Olympics. Skating with partner Lewis Gibson, Fear later admitted she was in shock and struggling to understand what had happened.The British duo had been performing strongly and were placed fourth after the rhythm dance. That position kept them close to a podium finish and raised hopes across Team GB. However, an error early in the free dance brought negative scores from judges and pushed them down to seventh place overall. The sudden fall in the standings left Fear tearful during interviews as she tried to process the moment and the lost opportunity for an Olympic medal.Fear spoke honestly after the routine and did not hide her disappointment. She said, “I can’t believe it happened. I’m replaying it in my head and it’s just such a shame. I don’t really have the words yet. It will take me some time to process. I can’t believe I just did that. I feel so bad, I’m devastated. I’m in shock. It’s such a shame because I know what we’re capable of. I just feel so bad.”The pair had hoped to become the first Team GB ice skaters to win an Olympic medal since Jayne Torvill and Christopher Dean took bronze in 1994. Their Scottish-themed free dance included music such asand. But during a rotation, Fear lost balance, and the technical mistake proved costly.Reflecting on the moment, Fear explained, “Just a really costly technical mistake, which was tough very early in the programme because I knew that we kinda lost bronze at that point. But I also really wanted to not let the Olympic experience just disappear because of that. It’s not what we’ve trained, and it was costly and devastating.”Gibson also shared his feelings, saying, “When you don’t perform the way you want to, on any day, it’s tough to take but at the Olympic Games, it’s even harder. I think we’ll look back at this one day and learn from it. We do that at every event. We’ll just move forward.”Despite the disappointment, the pair’s strong journey to the Olympics and their honest reaction showed courage in a painful moment on sport’s biggest stage.
Article Summary: Lilah fear and lewis gibson had hoped to become the first team gb ice skaters to win an olympic medal since jayne torvill and christopher dean took bronze in 1994. The british duo had been performing strongly and were placed fourth after the rhythm dance.

Article Title: NHL and IIHF executives meet in Milan as President Luc Tardif wants Russian and Belarusian players back soon
Article Text:
IIHF President Luc Tardif at Milan (Via Getty Images)

Luc Tardif hopes for Russian return but will follow IOC rules



The men's Olympic hockey tournament is underway in Milan without two of the sport's traditional powers. Russia and Belarus remain banned from international competition due to their involvement in the war in Ukraine, leaving a significant hole in what is supposed to be a best-on-best showcase.IIHF president Luc Tardif addressed the situation at a press conference on Thursday alongside NHL commissioner Gary Bettman and NHLPA executive director Marty Walsh. Tardif made clear where the federation stands on the matter."We want as soon as possible the Belarusians and the Russians back," Tardif said. "Because first, it will mean that the world will be a little bit better. But we follow the recommendation of the IOC." The absence of Russian players is particularly notable given their recent Olympic success.The Russians made it to back-to-back finals in the last two editions. While the 2018 PyeongChang games got them the gold, the 2022 edition in Beijing brought them a Silver as the team remains one of the most dominant sides in the sport.But that dominance didn’t last for long, as in 2022 the IOC banned both Russia and Belarus following the former’s invasion of Ukraine in February 2022.While some athletes from both nations can compete as Individual Neutral Athletes in other sports after rigorous vetting, hockey's team format makes that pathway impossible.The IOC's March 2023 recommendation stated that "a group of Individual Neutral Athletes cannot be considered a team." The IIHF confirmed it would follow that guidance, effectively shutting the door on Russian and Belarusian hockey participation through at least the 2025-26 season.Tardif's comments reflect the IIHF's position throughout the ban. The federation has consistently maintained that it follows IOC directives rather than making independent decisions on Russian and Belarusian participation.The Russian Olympic Committee was suspended by the IOC in October 2023 for recognizing regional Olympic councils in Russian-occupied regions of Ukraine. That suspension remains in effect, and the IOC has shown no indication of lifting sanctions while the war continues.For now, the 12-team Olympic tournament proceeds without nations that have combined to win three of the last four Olympic hockey medals. The press conference came on Day 2 of the men's tournament, which features Canada, the United States, Finland, Sweden, and Czechia.
Article Summary: Iihf president luc tardif addressed the situation at a press conference on thursday. Russia and belarus remain banned from international competition due to their involvement in the war in ukraine. The iihf confirmed it would follow that guidance, effectively shutting the door on russian and belarusian hockey participation.

Article Title: Olympian Chloe Kim “scolds” Myles Garrett as he cheers her on while she chases another gold at the 2026 Winter Olympics
Article Text:
Olympian Chloe Kim “scolds” Myles Garrett as he cheers her on while she chases another gold at the 2026 Winter Olympics.(Image via Getty Images)

Chloe Kim shares a moment with Myles Garrett where she "scolds" him



Chloe Kim "scolds" Myles Garrett.

Chloe Kim has spoken about her fears of dating Myles Garrett publicly



Myles Garrett, the Cleveland Browns’ star player, is dedicating all his time to being there for his girlfriend, popular Olympian Chloe Kim, as she chases another gold at the 2026 Winter Olympics.Over the last few months, ever since Myles Garrett and Chloe Kim went public with their relationship, they have the whole world rooting for them. Amid this, Chloe Kim has shared a moment she shared with Myles Garrett.A few hours ago, the NFL made a post from its official social media account with a few glimpses of Myles Garrett supporting Chloe Kim at the 2026 Winter Olympics.The caption of the post reads as, “Myles Garrett is one proud boyfriend ❤️”.While this sparked chaos among fans, 25 year old Olympian Chloe Kim reposted the picture on her Instagram story with a caption that read as, “Me scolding him for not bringing the sunscreen I bought him…”Chloe Kim has been pretty public about the love and commitment she has towards Myles Garrett ever since their kiss on the sidelines went viral.A few days ago, Olympian Chloe Kim spoke to ELLE where she opened up about dating Myles Garrett in the public eye and how it makes her feel.Chloe Kim said, “I’ve never really been in a public relationship. So I think I've always been a little scared of it…”The 25 year old Olympian opened up about the kiss they shared as she added, “But I did not know that that was going to happen. I think it was a really sweet thing. No one's mad about it. Which is a good start.”The two time Olympian, Chloe Kim, continued, “I don't think we were trying super hard to keep it private. But it wasn't something we wanted to blast publicly. We just did our thing. We're very happy. We're just going to keep supporting each other.”While Chloe Kim and Myles Garrett have turned heads with their love for one another, the 25 year old Olympian is fully focused on her career.After winning two gold medals, there are high possibilities of winning a third one at the 2026 Winter Olympics, as Myles Garrett cheers her on.
Article Summary: Olympian chloe kim “scolds” myles garrett as he cheers her on while she chases another gold at the 2026 winter olympics. Cleveland browns’ star player is dedicating all his time to being there for his girlfriend, chloe kim.
